snippet.title: Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash | Final Trailer
snippet.description:
Umamusume party fun is just around the corner. Are you ready for the start?

On Aug 30, 2024, go for Slapdash Grand Prix gold in Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash, an action-packed party game with four frenzied minigames: Hurtling Hurdles, Blazing Baskets, Dodgeball Demolition, and Gourmet Gauntlet.

Over 20 Characters — Unlock a total of 25 Umamusume just by playing the game. Get to know your favorites in a new light as they trade turf for turmoil in these unfamiliar sports.

Content Galore for One or More — Train for the Slapdash Grand Prix with each unique team of 5 characters in the singleplayer story mode, then invite them to hang out in your clubroom after decorating it with a colorful array of furniture. Or, if you're looking to put your skills to the test, duke it out with rivals at home or around the world in local and online multiplayer.


Check out the Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash official site and X account to get the latest news!

Umamusume: Pretty Derby – Party Dash Official Site
https://hachamecha-umamusume.jp/en/

Cygames Official X (formerly Twitter)
https://x.com/Cygames_EN

Platform: Nintendo Switch™ / PlayStation®4 / Steam®
Genre: Party Action
Players: 1-4 (Local or Online)
Release Date: Aug 30, 2024
Rating: IARC 3+ / ESRB EVERYONE
© Cygames, Inc. Developed by ARC SYSTEM WORKS
